          <title>
            <string language="sl">Polprevodnik in PN stik</string>
            <string language="en">Semiconductor and PN junction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Halbleiter und PN Verzweigung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Semi-conducteur et jonction de PN</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Semicondutor e junção do PN</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Semiconduttore e giunzione di PN</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ημιαγωγός και σύνδεση PN</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Semiconductor y ensambladura del PN</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Model polprevodnika na osnovi PN stika in koncept gibanja prostih nabojev.</string>
            <string language="en">Model of semiconductor based on PN junction and concept of motion of free charged particles.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">polprevodnik</string>
            <string language="en">semiconductor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">p-n stik</string>
            <string language="en">p-n junction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">colos</string>
            <string language="en">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">jacob</string>
            <string language="en">jacob</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Modell des Halbleiters basiert auf PN Verzweigung 
und Konzept der Bewegung der freien belasteten Partikel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Modèle de semi-conducteur basé sur la jonction 
de PN et le concept du mouvement des particules chargées libres.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Modelo do semicondutor baseado na junção do PN e
no conceito do movimento de partículas carregadas livres.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Modello del semiconduttore basato sulla giunzione 
di PN e sul concetto di movimento delle particelle caricate libere.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μοντέλο του ημιαγωγού βασισμένο στη σύνδεση PN και 
την έννοια της κίνησης των ελεύθερων χρεωμένων μορίων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Modelo del semiconductor basado en la ensambladura
del PN y el concepto del movimiento de partículas cargadas libres.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Halbleiter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">p-n Verzweigung</string>
          </keyword>
